CheckTitle: Checks if SageMaker notebook instances have direct internet access disabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a SageMaker notebook instance has direct internet access enabled.
Description: Checks if SageMaker notebook instances have direct internet access disabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if a SageMaker notebook instance has direct internet access enabled.
Risk: If SageMaker notebook instances have direct internet access enabled, it increases the risk of data exfiltration and unauthorized access.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure that SageMaker notebook instances have direct internet access disabled.
